This position requires a Senior DevOps Engineer with expertise in the Industrial / Manufacturing industry to implement and maintain critical infrastructure solutions. The role is based in Porto and offers an opportunity to work on cutting-edge technology projects.

Client Details

Our client is an international industrial group currently investing in Portugal, with the establishment of a new manufacturing facility in the country and a Support Office in Porto.

Description

  • Architect secure communication, over-the-air update mechanisms, and data collection/storage infrastructure for distributed systems.
  • Design, implement, and maintain CI/CD pipelines for embedded and real-time software platforms.
  • Manage cloud infrastructure (AWS) for development, testing, and production environments.
  • Implement infrastructure as code (Terraform, Ansible, or similar).
  • Set up containerization and orchestration (Docker, Kubernetes).
  • Monitor system performance, availability, and reliability.
  • Support development teams with automation of build, test, and deployment processes.
  • Ensure logging, metrics, and alerting systems are in place.
  • Collaborate with software and hardware engineers on integration workflows.

Profile

  • 8+ years of DevOps/SRE experience.
  • Strong expertise with AWS (EC2, S3, VPC, IAM, networking).
  • Proven experience with CI/CD tools (GitHub CI, ArgoCD, Jenkins, or similar).
  • Artifact repository managers like (JFrog, Nexus, Github, other)
  • Proficiency in containerization and orchestration (Docker, Kubernetes).
  • Solid knowledge of Linux administration and networking.
  • Experience with infrastructure as code (Terraform, Ansible, or equivalent).
  • Familiarity with software development processes for robotics (ArduPilot, ROS) is a plus.
  • Experience with monitoring/logging systems (e.g., Grafana, Victoria Metrics, VictoriaLogs, Prometeus) is a plus.
  • Experience with redundancy and cybersecurity practices is a plus.
  • Strong problem-solving and troubleshooting skills.
  • English proficiency for technical communication.

Job Offer

  • Competitive salary and benefits.
  • Engaging projects with a focus on cutting-edge technologies.
